price: 30. Mise waxay leeyihiin waa gabyaa, aan la sugno musiibo waqtiga la iman6.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ
footnotes: 6. Inay dhibaato uun ku dhacdo ama dhimasho dhaqso ah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
